testcase.name: Note 1. Note should be invalid if no title object provided
testcase.classname: 1. Note should be invalid if no title object provided

testcase.name: Note 2. Note should be invalid if title string is empty
testcase.classname: 2. Note should be invalid if title string is empty

testcase.name: Note 3. Note should be invalid if title is too long
testcase.classname: 3. Note should be invalid if title is too long

testcase.name: Note 4. Note should be invalid if content is too long
testcase.classname: 4. Note should be invalid if content is too long

testcase.name: Note 5. Note should be valid if title is correct
testcase.classname: 5. Note should be valid if title is correct

testcase.name: Note 6. Note should be valid if content is correct
testcase.classname: 6. Note should be valid if content is correct

testcase.name: Note 7. Note should have the correct default tab set
testcase.classname: 7. Note should have the correct default tab set

testcase.name: Note 8. Note should have the date automatically set
testcase.classname: 8. Note should have the date automatically set

testcase.name: User 1. User should be invalid if required fields are missing
testcase.classname: 1. User should be invalid if required fields are missing

testcase.name: User 2. User should be valid if required fields are provided
testcase.classname: 2. User should be valid if required fields are provided

testcase.name: User 3. User should be invalid if maximum number of notes is exceeded
testcase.classname: 3. User should be invalid if maximum number of notes is exceeded

testcase.name: User 4. User should be valid if maximum number of notes is not exceeded
testcase.classname: 4. User should be valid if maximum number of notes is not exceeded
